name: Malita: Soul of a Warrior
summary: Malita - Soul of a Warrior is a fast-paced beat 'em up game inspired by the universe of Alita: Battle Angel. Play as the cyborg Malita and become a hunter warrior who fights the mercenaries of Alloy city.
